data.eml:eml: Species of the fungivorous genus Psalidothrips Priesner from China, with five new species (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Chao, Zhang, Hongrui, Tong, Xiaoli (2018): Species of the fungivorous genus Psalidothrips Priesner from China, with five new species (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae). ZooKeys 746: 25-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.746.22882, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.746.22882
